snippet: Jakob Arjouni, who proved there could be such a thing as German crime fiction, raced against cancer to finish the fifth installment in his best-selling series.
abstract: Melville House Books publishes English translation of Brother Kemal, fifth and final installment in best-selling series by German crime fiction writer Jakob Arjouni; book was written as Arjouni battled terminal cancer.
lead_paragraph: Jakob Arjouni, who proved there could be such a thing as German crime fiction, raced against cancer to finish the fifth installment in his best-selling series.

headline.seo: Jakob Arjouni’s Last Novel, Now in English
headline.main: A Master of Crime Fiction in a Nation Lacking Them
headline.print_headline: A Master of Crime Fiction In a Nation Lacking Them
